name: WallBreaker!
description:
WEEK 1 OF MY GAME A WEEK ASSIGNMENT!

This was the first week of my 8 week game a week assignment, this week's theme was "10 Second Game", so I created WallBreaker!

You have 10 seconds to break as many purple walls as possible. Click to make the orb fly towards the mouse. Avoid the red walls and be quick! WallBreaker! will test your reaction and aiming skills as you continue to beat your high-score.

Have fun!
